data.message: HELP friend is locked out and cannot access the e-mail accounts associated and cannot get them because they're no longer in existance. Have attempted to contact to authenticate account like Twitter with a photo, but no response!

replies.message: Hi Jess. We're sorry to hear your friend is having trouble accessing their account, They may be able to get back into their Facebook account by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1r3gykX -Chantal

This has been tried, however since the security answer is case sensitive it will not take the answer hich means that verification won't work. Doesn't want to lose the account because of important history of friends photos/comment/messages that are deceased
has attempted to update email and mobile number on mobile app as well but cannot without a pw
yeah same as mine too. I have the same problem, can't log in my account on FB and when I try to search it, I can't find myself in FB anymore.
